subject: Seizures (Medical)
Football (College)
Epilepsy
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jerry Kill, probably the only college football coach who has a seizure protocol for his assistants, is not allowing his health to interfere with Minnesota’s efforts to rebuild.
snippet: Jerry Kill, probably the only college football coach who has a seizure protocol for his assistants, is not allowing his health to interfere with Minnesota’s efforts to rebuild.
